name: Mag&Cheese
description:
You are a small mouse and life used to be gouda. But Max, your owner, is fondue of those videos of hamsters going through obstacle courses. He's a little munster, so he's decided to make you go through some of his own design! But you don’t have to be prov-alone in this! He's bought you a mouse sized magnet gun to navigate the environment! Brie careful in your judgment, push and pull yourself to the platforms your owner placed and cheese your way to the ultimate goal! This project was done by a team of 9 people over a period of 10 days for the Global Game Jam. The theme being "Duality", we made a platforming game showcasing the push and pull interaction of magnetism

Known Issue : The VFXs don't seem to work for the web version of the game. For the real experience, you can download the .exe here : https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/magcheese-1
